mapper.select: select * from (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY no DESC) RNUM, no, content, subject, name, reg FROM NOTICE ) X where X.RNUM between #{first} and #{last}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NO, CONTENT, REG, SUBJECT, NAME) VALUES (SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{subject}, #{name})
mapper.update: update NOTICE set subject =#{subject}, content =#{content} where no =#{no}
